sources.title: Girl From Calgary
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Girl from Calgary (1932) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: Fifi D'Orsay, Paul Kelly, Robert Warwick
 Director: Phil Whitman

 A French-Canadian girl is a champion bronc rider and is also a nightclub singer. An ambitious young man sees her act one night and is struck by her talent, realizing that she is good enough to become a Broadway star. He convinces her to accompany him to New York, where she indeed does become a Broadway star. However, the young man finds himself being squeezed out by greedy Broadway producers who see the talented young girl as their own personal gold mine.

sources.title: The Girl from Calgary (1932) Comedy, Musical, Pre Code
sources.description:
A French-Canadian girl is a champion bronc rider and is also a nightclub singer. An ambitious young man sees her act one night and is struck by her talent, realizing that she is good enough to become a Broadway star. He convinces her to accompany him to New York in search of becoming a broadway star.

Director: Phil Whitman
Writers: Lee Chadwick , Leon D'Usseau
Stars: Fifi D'Orsay, Paul Kelly, Robert Warwick
Genres: Comedy, Musical, Pre Code

He convinces her to accompany him to New York, where she indeed does become a Broadway star.
